article_title: Netanyahu vows Hamas Rafah defeat despite US arms threat
sentence: Palestinian  media  said  two  people  were  killed  on  Thursday  afternoon  in  an  Israeli  air  strike  in  the  al-Jneineh  neighbourhood  of  Rafah  -  one  of  the  eastern  areas  which  the  Israel  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  ordered  residents  to  evacuate  before  beginning  its  ground  operation  began  on  Monday  night.

article_title: Netanyahu vows Hamas Rafah defeat despite US arms threat
sentence: Another  three  people  were  reportedly  killed  in  an  air  strike  in  the  nearby  Brazil  area,  which  is  not  in  the  evacuation  zone  but  is  next  to  the  Egyptian  border.

article_title: Netanyahu vows Hamas Rafah defeat despite US arms threat
sentence: Overnight,  at  least  five  people  were  reportedly  killed  when  a  family's  home  in  the  western  Tal  al-Sultan  neighbourhood  was  hit  in  an  Israeli  strike.

article_title: Netanyahu vows Hamas Rafah defeat despite US arms threat
sentence: Israel  launched  a  military  campaign  in  Gaza  to  destroy  Hamas  in  response  to  the  group's  attack  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  during  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  252  others  were  taken  hostage,  according  to  Israeli  authorities.

article_title: Netanyahu vows Hamas Rafah defeat despite US arms threat
sentence: More  than  34,900  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Netanyahu vows Hamas Rafah defeat despite US arms threat
sentence: Israel  says  128  hostages  are  unaccounted  for,  36  of  whom  are  presumed  dead.
